/usr/bin/c++      CMakeFiles/micarray_recorder_direct.dir/micarray_recorder_direct.cpp.o  -o micarray_recorder_direct -rdynamic driver/libmatrix_creator_hal.so -lpthread -lwiringPi -lwiringPiDev -lcrypt -lgflags -lfftw3f -lwiringPi -lwiringPiDev -lcrypt -Wl,-rpath,/home/pi/matrix-creator-hal/build/demos/driver
